title: Add English About Us page and homepage RKS contact block

requirements.summary: Create a public English About Us page describing DailyKart as an RKS Brand local ordering platform for Vrindavan with Terms & Policy and Help Desk/Contact details.
acceptanceCriteria: A new route is available at "/about" and renders without requiring login.
All user-facing text on the About Us page is in English.

The About Us page includes these sections (with clear headings): Overview (DailyKart purpose), Service Area (Vrindavan + nearby areas), Terms & Policy (Order Policy, Payment Policy, Delivery Policy, Cancellation Policy, Responsibility), and Help Desk / Contact Us.

The About Us page explicitly states that DailyKart is not the direct seller and that orders are forwarded to nearby shopkeepers; payments are made directly to the shopkeeper; delivery is handled by the shopkeeper.
The Help Desk / Contact section includes: Mobile Number 9897743469, Owner Name Ram Kumar Saini, Brand Name RKS Brand, Address "Vrindavan, Rukmani Vihar, Sector-2".

file_operations.description: Add a new public About Us page with clear English headings and content: Overview, Service Area (Vrindavan + nearby areas), Terms & Policy subsections (Order, Payment, Delivery, Cancellation, Responsibility), and Help Desk / Contact Us including the required RKS Brand/owner/mobile/address details. Ensure the page explicitly states DailyKart is not the direct seller and orders are forwarded to nearby shopkeepers, with payment and delivery handled by the shopkeeper.
Register the new "/about" route in the TanStack Router route tree and wire it to the newly created AboutPage component (public, no auth guard).

requirements.summary: Add an "About Us" navigation link in the existing header for both desktop and mobile menus without altering existing nav actions.
acceptanceCriteria: The site header shows an "About Us" link alongside existing navigation items.
The "About Us" link works on both desktop and mobile menus and navigates to "/about".
Adding this link does not remove or change existing navigation actions (Home, All Products, Cart, Admin).

file_operations.description: Add a new nav item labeled "About Us" pointing to "/about" and ensure it appears and works in both desktop navigation and the mobile menu, while keeping existing navigation items/actions (Home, All Products, Cart, Admin) unchanged.

requirements.summary: Add a mobile-friendly bottom section on the Home page showing RKS brand name, address, and contact number only on "/".
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, a clearly visible bottom section appears below the main content and before the global footer ends.
The section displays these fields in English with the exact values: Brand Name: RKS; Address: Vrindavan, Rukmani Vihar, Sector-2; Contact Number: 9897743469.
The section is not shown on non-home routes (e.g., /products, /cart, /checkout, /admin/*, /about).
This section follows the existing site styling system (Tailwind theme tokens) and is mobile-friendly (no horizontal overflow, readable on small screens).

file_operations.description: Create a reusable Home-only bottom block component that renders exactly three English items with the required values: Brand Name: RKS; Address: Vrindavan, Rukmani Vihar, Sector-2; Contact Number: 9897743469. Style using existing Tailwind theme tokens and ensure mobile-friendly layout (no horizontal overflow).

Wire the new HomeRksContactBlock into the Home page ("/") below the existing main content so it appears before the global SiteFooter. Ensure it is only included on this page so it does not render on other routes.
